title: Basketball players sue university, former coach over alleged mishandling of assault
description: William "Deuce" Benjamin Jr. and Shakiru "Shak" Odunewu filed a lawsuit against New Mexico State University over handling of sexual assault and harassment allegations.

title: Tyre Nichols' official autopsy reveals brain injuries from blunt force trauma: DA
description: The medical examiner's official autopsy report for Tyre Nichols showed he "died of brain injuries from blunt force trauma," the DA's office told Nichols' family Tuesday.

title: Teens arrested in rock-throwing spree now face 13 charges each
description: Three teenagers face 13 charges, including murder, for allegedly throwing large landscaping rocks toward seven vehicles on suburban Denver roads on April 19.

title: Legislation could help address racial disparity in missing persons cases: Advocates
description: Out of approximately 546,000 people reported missing last year, 36% of those were Black, according to the National Crime Information Center.

title: Republicans in this state have introduced a new 12-week abortion ban
description: North Carolina Republicans have introduced a new 12-week abortion ban with limited exceptions that they intend to pass this week.

title: Man dies after placed in chokehold on NYC subway amid rise in anti-homeless sentiment
description: A man who is believed to be homeless has died after being placed in a chokehold by another passenger on the New York City subway.

title: Fed raises interest rates 0.25%, escalating inflation fight amid banking woes
description: Rate hikes have contributed to a banking crisis and economic slowdown this year.

title: 3 arrested for sextortion scam
description: Parents of teenager who died by suicide because of a sextortion scam urge parents to have "tough" conversation

title: Man fatally shot during altercation at Tesla charging station, authorities say
description: A man was killed during an altercation at a Tesla charging station in Colorado Wednesday, authorities said.

title: In historic approval, FDA clears 1st RSV vaccine for older adults in US
description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has approved the first RSV vaccine in the U.S.

title: Atlanta shooting live updates: Multiple people injured, suspect at large
description: Multiple people have been injured in an active shooter incident Wednesday in Atlanta, police said.

title: Here's how US debt default could affect you
description: Millions of Americans who rely on federal payments to make ends meet, could be negatively impacted if the government is unable to pay its bills come June 1.

title: `Insufficient support' blamed for courthouse floor collapse
description: A federal agency says construction crews had placed “insufficient support” beneath part of an upper floor that collapsed during renovations on the historic federal courthouse in Savannah, Georgia

title: Wheels in motion for next Philly Naked Bike Ride in August
description: If you're eager for another nude bike ride through the City of Brotherly Love, keep your shirt on — for now

title: Mom, 3 kids killed in mass shooting at apartment
description: A mom and her three kids were killed in a mass shooting at an apartment in Lake Wales, Florida.

title: US sprinter, Olympic medalist Tori Bowie dies at 32
description: The management company for Olympic sprinter Tori Bowie says she died

title: Florida to pursue death penalty for suspect in murder of Microsoft executive
description: Florida prosecutors intend to seek the death penalty for the man who is accused of masterminding the murder of Microsoft executive Jared Bridegan.

title: Mother, 3 children fatally shot in Florida; suspect sought
description: Police are looking for a man suspected of killing a 40-year-old woman and her three children ages 21, 17 and 11 in their central Florida home

title: Virginia inmates 'manipulated locks' to escape jail: US Marshal
description: The two men are considered very dangerous by authorities,

title: Brazil police search Bolsonaro's home, seize his phone
description: A Brazilian official says Federal Police have searched former President Jair Bolsonaro’s home and seized his phone

title: Human remains found inside 2 crocodiles believed to be missing fisherman
description: A search and rescue operation for a fisherman who went missing in a national park in Australia has been called off after human remains were found inside two crocodiles.

title: US, Mexico reach migration deal as Title 42 deadline nears
description: President Joe Biden's administration said it's reached a critical agreement with Mexican officials to address the migration as Title 42 restrictions end.

title: America's opioid epidemic: Fatal fentanyl overdoses have risen 279% since 2016
description: A new federal report found that overdose deaths in the U.S. linked to fentanyl rose 279% since 2016 as heroin deaths have declined.

title: S. Korean, Japanese officials meet ahead of leaders' summit
description: Senior South Korean and Japanese officials have discussed strengthening relations and coordinating responses to North Korea’s nuclear and missile threats in a meeting ahead of a summit between their leaders

title: 12 die in explosion, helicopter crash during Chinese holiday
description: At least nine people were killed in an explosion at a Chinese petrochemical plant and three others died in a helicopter crash during the country’s May Day holiday

title: Teenage boy opens fire at Belgrade school, killing 1 and injuring 4
description: The suspect is a 14-year-old boy who allegedly took his father's gun to school in Belgrade, according to local police.

title: Rising teenage equestrian star killed after horse falls on her head in competition
description: An “up-and-coming” teenage equestrian has died following a freak accident during a competition in Florida over the weekend.

title: Former CEOs of failed banks to testify before Senate panel
description: The former top executives of two failed banks will testify before Congress this month

title: Alabama church shooter gets life for killing 3 at potluck
description: A man has been sentenced to life in prison without parole in the killing of three people at an Alabama church dinner in June

title: Michigan school district bans all backpacks from buildings, citing safety concerns
description: A school district in Michigan has banned all backpacks from school buildings, in response to growing safety concerns.

title: Man believed to be suspect accused of gunning down 5 taken into custody: DA
description: A suspect believed to be the man accused of gunning down five people in an "execution-style" mass shooting in Cleveland, Texas, has been taken into custody.

title: WATCH:  Officer nearly crushed by out-of-control car
description: Virginia authorities want parents to talk to their teens about “how their driving behavior can affect the lives of others” after a teen lost control of their vehicle and nearly crushed an officer.

title: Dog tied to sinking boat rescued by Coast Guard
description: Two people and a dog were rescued Monday after their boat sank off the coast of Georgia, the U.S. Coast Guard said.

title: Key takeaways from Senate hearing on Supreme Court ethics
description: Senators sharply disagreed on whether Congress can impose a code of conduct on the Supreme Court amid recent controversies.

title: Woman arrested for allegedly throwing wine at Matt Gaetz
description: Florida woman arrested for throwing wine at Matt Gaetz
